posts.post_content:
Have acquired a beautiful 1896 Boston Beaneaters Engraving piece on Ebay (which includes a myriad of HOFs including Nichols, Selee, Hamilton, Collins and Duffy) for your consideration. 

Here is an earlier thread about this very piece

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=196599[/url]

asking SOLD or would consider trade for ??

Thank you as always,
Paul

Bump. 'Cause it never hurts to ask.

-Paul

Bump, but with trade bait added

Thank you as always,
Paul

its the proverbial white whale, but I'll keep asking every 6 months or so

thanks,

Paul

posts.post_title: Item now being offered for sale (preferred) or trade
